title.narrative: Joining Forces for Africa (JOFA)- protecting children during the COVID-19 crisis and beyond

description.narrative: This action has been designed to respond rapidly to the global COVID-19 pandemic emergency. It seeks to address the most marginalised vulnerable population in Bugiri and Busia in Uganda
Expenditure 2020
